data.comment: Geoff Eltringham starts the match. Luton with the kick-off in Sheffield.
The first-half is over at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 46, Sheffield Wed have kicked-off the second half at Hillsborough Stadium.
Moses Odubajo (Sheffield Wed) has received a first yellow card.
Josh Windass is on a sub for Callum Paterson for Sheffield Wed.
In the minute 69, Kazenga LuaLua is replacing Elliott Lee for Luton at Hillsborough Stadium.
Ruddock Pelly scores to make it 0-1 at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 75, Garry Monk (Sheffield Wed) is making a second substitution, with Julian Borner replacing Jack Marriott.
Sheffield Wed make their third substitution with Jordan Rhodes replacing Joey Pelupessy.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ryan Tunnicliffe is replacing Joe Morrell for the away team.
Martin Cranie (Luton) gets a yellow card.
